abstract: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, appeared humbled by the bank’s third consecutive drop in quarterly earnings, telling investors on a conference call that “the current environment is the most challenging I have dealt with.”
lead_paragraph: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, appeared humbled by the bank’s third consecutive drop in quarterly earnings, telling investors on a conference call that “the current environment is the most challenging I have dealt with.”

headline.main: A Quiet Call for BofA’s Chief
